translations.home.decoration.main: Woman enjoying treatment in a cozy environment
translations.home.hero.description: We are dedicated to restoring the natural beauty of your skin. Through a practice dedicated to care, we want to help women of all ages feel confident in their own skin. We deal with the removal of acne, scars, and hyperpigmentation and bring the skin to a healthy glow.
translations.home.hero.title: Welcome to Marush Space of care
translations.home.instagram.image-description: The latest instagram posts of Marush profile
translations.home.instagram.title: Marush on instagram
translations.home.services.care-at-home.description: After leaving the salon, we want you to know how to take care of your skin and prolong the effect of the procedure
translations.home.services.consultations.description: Free consultations about treatments or combinations of procedures that are needed to achieve your needs and goals
translations.home.services.skin-check.description: It is important to correctly determine the condition of the skin, its type and what it needs
translations.home.services.title: What services do we offer?
translations.home.space.decoration.lower: Adding lavender oil to a diffuser
translations.home.space.decoration.upper: A woman enjoys a coffee on the balcony while reading a newspaper after the treatment
translations.home.space.description.lower: Our treatments are not time-limited, so you can listen to a podcast, watch an episode of your favorite series with a cup of tea, or drink a glass of wine.
translations.home.space.description.upper: Marush is more than a beauty salon; it is a place where you can completely relax while you take care of your skin.
translations.home.space.title: Space
translations.ie.warning: We're sorry but Marush - Space of Care doesn't support Internet Explorer. Please try using some modern browser.
translations.routes.home.description: Marush beauty salon: space and place for health and care. Located in center of Belgrade, we offer various cosmetic procedures for skin and face care in our cozy environment.
